name: Disappointment (Game Jam)
description:
Controls:
  • Z / O - Pick up / Interact
  • X / P - Drop / Cancel
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Unfortunately I've only had time to create an extrememly unfinished game for this jam so all you're able to do is walk around the 3 small rooms, picking up a key to use on a door and a note that you are able to read.
